update.description:

A dk1 and dk2 oculus are setup on a desk. There are also two new dk2 on carlos's desk.

update.title: Support for oculus dk2

content.raw:
use `version 120`? otherwise it'll just output some warnings in ogre.log on deprecated version 120 api calls. 

It should be safe to change as I don't think there are 130 specific API calls. I tested it on my desktop and it's working fine. 

the X11 server we're using on OSX also supports up to version 120 so it would be nice to stay in version 120 for now
content.html:
use version 120? otherwise it'll just output some warnings in ogre.log on deprecated version 120 api calls.

It should be safe to change as I don't think there are 130 specific API calls. I tested it on my desktop and it's working fine.

the X11 server we're using on OSX also supports up to version 120 so it would be nice to stay in version 120 for now

content.raw: Both `warp.vert` and `warpWithChromeAb.frag` are referenced by [glsl120.program](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/dk2/media/materials/scripts/glsl120.program). Do they need to be deleted?
content.html: Both warp.vert and warpWithChromeAb.frag are referenced by glsl120.program. Do they need to be deleted?

content.raw: I'm guessing that I had trouble reproducing it because it was finding the system install of `warpWithChromeAb.frag`?
content.html: I'm guessing that I had trouble reproducing it because it was finding the system install of warpWithChromeAb.frag?

content.raw: Seems to be complaining that [warpWithChromeAb.frag is missing](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/626/consoleFull)
content.html: Seems to be complaining that warpWithChromeAb.frag is missing

content.raw: First attempt to reproduce wasn't successful, it may be a problem with the build script? I'm going to try another jenkins build with extra debugging output.
content.html: First attempt to reproduce wasn't successful, it may be a problem with the build script? I'm going to try another jenkins build with extra debugging output.
